approveMangrove(address,uint256).notice: `this` contract needs to approve Mangrove to let it perform outbound token transfer at the end of the `makerExecute` function NB anyone can call this function

redeemToken(address,address,uint256).notice: transfers token stored in `this` contract to some recipient address

set_shift(int256,bool,uint256[]).notice: New positions 0<= i < s are initialized with amount[i] in base tokens if `withBase`. In quote tokens otherwise

set_treasury(bool,address).notice: Sets the account from which base (resp. quote) tokens need to be fetched or put during trade execution

withdrawFromMangrove(address,uint256).notice: withdraws ETH from the bounty vault of the Mangrove. ETH are sent to `receiver`

userdoc.notice: In case of a partial fill of an offer at position i, the offer residual is reposted (see `Persistent` strat class)
